attributes.additional_details: WE the people, call upon the Cameron government to introduce new laws, to make judicial corruption across the Commonwealth, a crime in the United Kingdom, and all judicial officers, from the fifty three (53) member countries, are to pass laws to have all misconduct and criminal investigations, charges, prosecutions and sentencing in the Royal Courts of Justice.  We the people, demand, that no Commonwealth member country has the right to appoint any person, commission or court to investigate, charge or try any misconduct whatsoever or criminal charge against any judicial officer except the Master of the Rolls and the Lord Chief Justice of the Royal Courts of Justice.
